Dear All, 

If you unfortunately failed Calculus I before and are afraid of the class clash in the coming semesters, this summer there will be a Calculus I Summer Credit Course taught in English for you.  

 
Calculus I Summer Credit Course

Date:   July 03rd~July 26th

Time:   9:00~ 12:00 every weekday

Place:   A231 in Science Building II

Lecturer:  Yao Huaijie

Credit:  3

Fee:       3300/ each person

Registration Date: 112/05/15~112/06/07

Registration Link: 
https://forms.gle/WQhDSFUPww24vaZL8


* If the teacher needs to adjust the schedule, he will inform you. There will be 54 hours in total.

* The attached syllabus is for your reference.  

If there is any problem, please don't hesitate to let us know. 
Thanks. 


Monica
